de.sdc

Class Client

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.sdc.Client

  • public class Client
extends Object
    This is the client which could receive commands from a server and forwards the commands to the caller
    Author:
    Michael Pietsch (Skywalker-11)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Client(String host, int port)
      starts connection to server. if you want to use an init command from the server receiveInitCommand should be the next method that is called on the client

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      closes the streams and the socket

      disconnects the client

      checks if the client is connected to the server

      !!!

    • Constructor Detail

      • Client

        public Client(String host,
              int port)
       throws IOException
        starts connection to server. if you want to use an init command from the server receiveInitCommand should be the next method that is called on the client
        Parameters:
        host - server to connect
        port - server port
        Throws:
        IOException - error during connection with server

    • Method Detail

      • receiveInitCommand

        public InitCommand receiveInitCommand()
                               throws IOException
        !!! If you want to receive an initCommand from the server this method must be the first method called after creating the client object!!! receives an initcommand from the server. If no Initializer is specified in the server no init command will be send and so this method will always throw an InvalidClassException
        Returns:
        initcommand returned by the server (initializer could be null if no initializer is specified in the server
        Throws:
        IOException - error during connection with server

      • isConnected

        public boolean isConnected()
        checks if the client is connected to the server
        Returns:
        true if connection is established, false else

      • requestCommand

        public Command requestCommand()
                       throws IOException
        retrieves command from server by sending a request task
        Returns:
        command returned by server
        Throws:
        IOException - a SocketException is thrown if an error occured with the network connection. An EOFException occures if the server was shut down

      • sendCommand

        public void sendCommand(Command command)
                 throws IOException
        sends a command to the server
        Parameters:
        command - command should be send to the server
        Throws:
        IOException - error during connection with server

      • sendResult

        public void sendResult(ResultCommand command)
                throws IOException
        sends a command to the server
        Parameters:
        command - command should be send to the server
        Throws:
        IOException - error during connection with server

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect()
                throws IOException
        disconnects the client
        Throws:
        IOException - error during connection with server

      • close

        public void close()
           throws IOException
        closes the streams and the socket
        Throws:
        IOException - error during connection with server
